847840.name: Futanari Quest - Wallpaper Pack
847840.description:
This DLC pack contains 25 wallpapers for your PC!

Spice up your computer or mobile device with wallpapers featuring the characters of Futanari Quest! All your favorite girls are here: Yui, Emi, Madeline, Isadora, Aria and more! Plus, as a bonus, some fan favorite monster girls also appear!

[LOCATE YOUR DLC ONCE DOWNLOADED]

All wallpapers are added to the game's Steam directory after purchase. The default location is:

\Program Files (x86)\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Futanari Quest

If this is not valid, locate your game's install directory using these instructions:

- Open the Steam client and navigate to your game library
- Right-click the entry for Futanari Quest and select Properties
- Click the Local Files tab
- Click Browse Local Files

This will open the game's directory, and once your DLC is installed, you'll be able to view the wallpaper files.
